M14/1/AXGEO/SP1/GEO/TZ0/XX




      22140543

GEORGIAN A: LITERATURE – STANDARD LEVEL – PAPER 1
GÉORGIEN A : Littérature – NIVEAU MOYEN – ÉPREUVE 1
GEORGIANO A: LITERATURA – NIVEL MEDIO – PRUEBA 1

Friday 9 May 2014 (morning)
Lundi 9 mai 2014 (matin)
Lunes 9 de mayo de 2014 (mañana)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES
 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a guided literary analysis on one passage only. In your answer you must address both
  of the guiding questions provided.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS
 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez une analyse littéraire dirigée d’un seul des passages. Les deux questions d’orientation
  fournies doivent être traitées dans votre réponse.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [20 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS
 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un análisis literario guiado sobre un solo pasaje. Debe abordar las dos preguntas de
  orientación en su respuesta.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].




2214-0543                                                                                   5 pages/páginas
                                                             © International Baccalaureate Organization 2014
                                           –2–            M14/1/AXGEO/SP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

dawereT erT-erTi teqstis literaturuli komentari.           Tqvens pasuxSi
gaTvaliswinebuli unda iyos qvemoT mocemuli orive miTiTebis moTxovna.

1.

                 saqarTvelos rusebis mfarvelobis qveS Sesvlamdinac svimon
            CofikaSvili iyo erTi miRebuli kacTagani mefesTan. amas ebara mTeli mTis
            xalxi da is simagreebi, romelsac kavkasiis kars uwodebdnen _ dariela.
                 es piri jer winaaRmdegi iyo ruseTis mfarvelobis qveS Sesvlisa,  magram
      5     ukanasknel rCevazed,  romelic mefis sasaxleSi iyo gamarTuli, Seityo mefis
            gadawyvetili survili da, rogorc mefis erTgulTagani, romelsac mefis
            wadilis winaaRmdegoba momakvdav codvad miaCnda, damorCilda brZanebas
            da miemxro SeerTebis msurvelTa.
                 rCevis Semdeg isev Tavis mTebSi dabrunda da, mefis brZanebisamebr,
     10     Tavis Tavze miiRo zrunva momavals rusebzed.
                 is gulmodgined asrulebda am samsaxurs da cdilobda mefe giorgis
            aRsruleboda is wadili da is sargebloba, romelsac mefe da misi
            momxreni am mfarvelobisagan moelodnen. rusebmac Cqara SeniSnes svimon,
            radgan dainaxes imisi gavlena mTaSi da Tavis mxriTac jarebis Sesaxeb
     15     miandes sxvadasxva gankarguleba. rasakvirvelia, es imaTTvis sasargeblo
            piri kidec daajildoves da pirdapir maioris mundiriT da epoletebiT
            mxarbeWi auyvaves.
                 svimonis amgvarma mdgomareobam Suri aRuZra gagis, romelsac samudamo
            zrunvad Seeqna svimonis damcireba, rom imisi adgili TviTon daeWira.
     20     amisaTvis gagi SeuCnda aleqsandre batoniSvils, daarwmuna, rom rusebis
            Semosvlis mizezi mxolod svimon iyo, da es rom ar ereodes saqmeSi da
            ar uSlides, rusebis gandevna advili iqmnebodao. batoniSvili winadve
            icnobda svimons, rogorc erT sasargeblo da Wkvian kacs da amisTvis imis
            dacema iqamdis ar undoda, sanam imis momxrobas ar scdida.
     25          aleqsandrem, romelsac xevsureTSi Tavis momxre jarebi Seeyara,
            gamougzavna kaci svimons da iTxovda misgan sruls morCilebas, xevidgan
            rusebis garekas da am ukanasknelebisaTvis Semosasvlel gzebis Sekvras.
            am brZanebis aRsrulebisaTvis mefe pirdeboda dids pativs da wyalobas,
            magram ukeTu svimon ar damorCileboda, maSin emuqreboda sarCo-sabadeblis
     30     gadawvas da col-SviliT amowyvetas.
                 _ roca dro iyo, mec viZaxodi: rad gvinda rusebi-meTqi! magram mefema
            brZana, SemouSvio, da mec mefis brZanebas saiT gadauvlidi? _ warmosTqva
            svimonma da Cahkida Tavi.
                 _ maS exla, exla ras apireb?
     35          _ axla gvian-Raa, gvian! …
                 _ maS ra pasuxs aZlev batoniSvils, imis mxares ar iWer?
                 _ ara.
                 _ ras ambob? xom sul amogwyvetavs, saxl-kars amogiwvavs!
                 _ rai uyo? … Tu rusebis SemoSveba ar gindodaT, maSin winadve unda
     40     gefiqraT, Tu ara da exla, roca yvela simagreebi xelSi Caigdes, me riT-Ra
            ganvdevno?
                 _ gaige karga, rom rusebs mefe mfarvelobasa sTxovs da …



2214-0543
                                             –3–              M14/1/AXGEO/SP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

                 _ mec egre mgonia! … aba,     rai uyo? mefes egre unda … _ raRac
            mwuxarebiT warmosTqva svimonma da detyo,         rom is moqmedebda Tavis
   45       survilis winaaRmdeg.
                 gakvirvebuli mociqulebi yurs ugdebdnen svimonis gadawyvetilebas,
            isini icnobdnen svimons mTis kacad, romlisTvisac Tavisufleba yvelazed
            umaRlesi jildo aris.        da es ki Tavis Tavs da Tavis qveyanas sxva
            gvartomobis xalxs monad aZlevda! monad aZlevda amisTvis, rom TviTonac
   50       darwmunebuli iyo, rom saqarTvelo rusebis batonobas ver gadarCeboda.
                 _ maS batoniSvils ra pasuxs uTvli?
                 _ batoniSvilsa?       Cemgan xvewna da mudara moaxsene: mefes nu
            ewinaaRmdegeba da saqarTvelos Zalas Suaze nu hyofs … Tu erTad viqnebiT,
            rusebi kidev veras gvizamen,magram,Tu Sua gaviyaviT,maSin Cveni saqme wasulia!
   55       … Cavides mefesTan, moudges gverdsa da raica rusebTan pirobebi gvaqvs,
            isini aasrulebinos! Torem Tu egre moviqeciT, Cven erTmaneTTan brZolaSi
            daviqancebiT, davsustdebiT, da rusebi ki TavianT wadils aasruleben …
            Cavides mefesTan,   Ca! mefe RvTisagan aris daniSnuli, imis gulis pasuxs
            kaci ver miwvdebis, _ mefes yvela unda emorCilebodes.
   60            _ ufrTxildi, svimon, batoniSvili ganrisxdeba mag pasuxiT da maSin
            veRaravin gixsnis.
                 _ ra uyo! … mefis survils da brZanebas ver gadaval da Tu mefe
            brZanebs, marto me Sevebmi rusebs.
                 am pasuxiT gaistumra iman Suakacebi, romelTac batoniSvils am
   65       sityvebis azri srulebiT sxvarigad gadasces. imaT Caagones, rom svimon
            Ralatobs samSoblosac da TiTon mefesac, rom svimons xalxis mosveneba
            da Tavisufleba brWyviala tanisamoszed gaucvlia.
                 batoniSvilma gamoistumra jarebi svimonis dasasjelad da gagis
            Caabara imaTzed ufrosoba. es ambavi svimons Seatyobines da is Tavis
   70       col-SviliT gaixizna CerqezeTSi, Tavis colis samSobloSi, sadac
            ramodenime xans darCa.
                 svimons ise saCqarod mouxda Tavis saxlidan gaqceva,  ise moulodnelad,
            rom Zlivs moaswro cocxali Tavis gaxweva da saqoneli, simdidre Tu sxva
            bargi,  yvelaferi iq darCa da Seiqmna ganadgurebuli Semoseulis jarisagan.
   75       svimonis saxli gacarcves, Semdeg cecxli waukides da, risac waReba ver
            SeiZles, mTlad Cabuges.

                                                       aleqsandre yazbegi, elguja (1881)


      (a)     imsjeleT, rogor xsniT svimon CofikaSvilis qcevis motivs da rogor
              aris igi teqstSi warmodgenili.

      (b)     gaaanalizeT, ra mxatvrul saSualebebs               iyenebs    avtori      svimon
              CofikaSvilis zneobrivi saxis dasaxatavad.




2214-0543                                           Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                                     –4–            M14/1/AXGEO/SP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

2.

                 es ra eSmakma aaborga amaRam qari,
                 amiwioka, damirbia man STagoneba!
                 Tbilisis quCebs davedevne, vixme amqari
                 daviwyebuli firosmanis mosagoneblad.

             5   aq, am quCebSi, dadioda, rogorc sizmari
                 (saqarTvelos cas aq etrfoda misi ocneba),
                 Camoxeuli, tanmaRali, marad xizani,
                 martoden guli da bajaRlo patiosneba.

                 mival, mxvdebian sazandrebi, quCis mgosnebi,
            10   bnelTan mebrZoli usinaTlo meTareebi,
                 `tvindasetyvili~ nikalais Zveli dostebi,
                 da cocxldebian firosmanis mware dReebi.

                 vetyvi: `rogorme moigoneT, Zia-kacebo,
                 loTi mxatvari, martosuli da megobari,
            15   miTxariT rame firosmanis bedis garSemo
                 da mere SevsvaT misi xsovnis Sesandobari!~

                 _ `TviTrjuli~ iyo, aumRvria sisxli Tbilisma,
                 sul marto iyo, marto svamda, marto gaTavda,
                 funjis mosmis dros hqonda raRac jado-Tilisma,
            20   arays dalevda da qveyanas dagixatavda!

                 _ Semogxedavda darcxvenili, ver gaigebdi,
                 ra Wkvisa iyo, ra hazrebis da ra gunebis,
                 uyvarda mtkvari, mtkvarze _ tivi, tivze _ tikebi,
                 goWi, mwvanili da frTiani oragulebi!

            25   _ roca zafxuli dadgeboda Tbilis-qalaqSi,
                 javrobda: xedav, yvelaferi rogor xmebao,
                 gaexveoda iremiviT mwvane balaxSi:
                 sofelSi veRar mivdivar da meamebao …

                 _ arc koxta iyo sacodavi da arc arTvali.
            30   amayi iyo, Cven morCilad videqiT masTan,
                 eh … axla gaxda nikalai didi mxatvari.
                 ufasod gaqra, ufasod da axla dafasda!

                 _ netavi am dros moswreboda mis nacnobebTan!
                 (vai, ra uRvTod daiRupa sawyalma Tavi!)
            35   Tbilis-qalaqis yvela mxatvars is ajobebda,
                 ar darCeboda araferi dauxatavi!




2214-0543
                                        –5–           M14/1/AXGEO/SP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

                     hyvebian ase firosmanis drois qadagni,
                     yvela maTganSi dauviwyar nikalas vxedav …
                     dgas firosmanis moxatuli Tbilis-qalaqi _
                40   es poeziis uwmindesi adgilis deda!

                     me vusmen yvelas, warmovidgen cxovrebas misas,
                     cocxldeba Cem win mkrTali saxe ferebis mgosnis,
                     mTvareuliviT davemxobi Tbilisis miwas
                     da didi niko firosmanis naterfals vkocni!

                                     lado asaTiani, firosmanis megobrebTan (1940)


      (a)   imsjeleT, rogor ixateba mxatvris saxe da misi cxovreba am leqsSi.

      (b)   gaaanalizeT, ra mxatvrul saSualebebs iyenebs avtori mxatvris Sesaxeb
            Tavisi ganwyobis gamosaxatavad.




2214-0543
